system.description: Also at 15th level, if you’ve chosen @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.Ag1d3VyeU3B3TvBE]{Path of the Revenant}, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.hkw7727vrhldbqod]{True Revenant} feat, and disregard the one-year time limit normally imposed by it. If you’ve chosen @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3Jb49f3nacLzry86]{Path of the Vampire}, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.7j8x3mk3xhoy8aym]{Vampire Lord} feat. If you’ve chosen @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.orEuSrQOYCY8xHXq]{Path of the Mummy}, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.syhsytt9kgrzp3bl]{Mummy Lord} feat.
